fact.description: The match has started at Estadio Nacional de Brasilia .

Ball safe as Ghana is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Can Ghana get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Portugal's half?
Throw-in Portugal.
Ghana needs to be cautious. Portugal have an attacking throw-in.
